message.content:
You are verifying product data for GelChile's electromagnetic electrode products. Your task is to READ the technical datasheets (DOCX files) and compare them against the product JSON files, documenting ALL discrepancies.

## Products to verify:
1. **ELE-001** (HE-45): Ficha at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 45  (HE).docx`, JSON at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-001.json`
2. **ELE-002** (HE-70): Ficha at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 70  (HE).docx`, JSON at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-002.json`
3. **ELE-003** (HE-100): Ficha at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 100  (HE).docx`, JSON at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-003.json`
4. **ELE-004** (HE-200): Ficha at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ESPECIFICACIÓN TÉCNICA EETT ELECTRODO HE-200.docx`, JSON at `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-004.json`

## For each product:
1. Read the DOCX ficha técnica (these are Word documents, read them directly)
2. Read the product JSON
3. Compare EVERY field: title, description, features, specs (each key-value pair), techTable data
4. Note ANY discrepancy, no matter how small (wrong number, different unit, missing info, extra info not in ficha)

## Output format:
For each product, provide:
```
### ELE-XXX (HE-YY)
**Ficha says:** [exact values from ficha]
**JSON says:** [current values in JSON]
**Discrepancies:**
- Field: specs.Capacidad — Ficha: "45 Amperios" / JSON: "45A" (minor formatting)
- Field: specs.Material — Ficha: "Cobre electrolítico" / JSON: "Cobre" (missing detail)
...
**No issues found in:** [list of fields that match]
```

Be extremely thorough. This is for a commercial product catalog that needs to be 100% accurate. DO NOT make edits - only report findings.

python3 -c "
import zipfile
import xml.etree.ElementTree as ET
import sys

def extract_text_from_docx(path):
    with zipfile.ZipFile(path, 'r') as z:
        with z.open('word/document.xml') as f:
            tree = ET.parse(f)
            root = tree.getroot()
            ns = {'w': 'http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/wordprocessingml/2006/main'}
            paragraphs = root.findall('.//w:p', ns)
            text_lines = []
            for p in paragraphs:
                runs = p.findall('.//w:r/w:t', ns)
                line = ''.join(r.text for r in runs if r.text)
                if line.strip():
                    text_lines.append(line.strip())
            return text_lines

path = r'c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 45  (HE).docx'
lines = extract_text_from_docx(path)
for line in lines:
    print(line)
"

8: Indicé……………………………………………...2

13: Datos…………………........................................7
14: Resultados………..............................................8

17: INTRODUCCION
18: Dentro del mercado de electrodos de puesta a tierra, existe la necesidad de realizar proyectos de integración donde se procure, por medio de cálculos, el acomodo teórico de los electrodos de puesta a tierra, de tal modo que en cantidad y en orden brinden una baja resistencia y una capacidad de corriente adecuada para la instalación eléctrica que se está protegiendo con el sistema de puesta a tierra. Dicho acomodo y cantidad de electrodos se determina en base al IEEE donde se itera la fórmula de la resistencia y corriente del arreglo y del electrodo respectivamente para llegar a resultados concluyentes.
19: Dado que el Electrodo Electromagnético (E.E.)  no es un electrodo de forma y dimensiones comunes, es imposible tomar las ecuaciones del IEEE para la realización de la iteración de las mismas y llegar a resultados concluyentes, por lo cual, basados en [1] se estima la ecuación del Electrodo electromagnético apegada a las existentes en el IEEE. El objetivo de este documento es el de realizar los cálculos para cada electrodo y presentarlos para su publicación, y que sean de utilidad al momento de realizar la proyección del sistema de tierra física de cada instalación eléctrica.
20: CARACTERISTICAS HE – 45k
21: Unidad de Medida: Kit
22: Nombre: Electrodo Electromagnético
23: Capacidad Max: SEGÚN TABLA NUMERO 1
24: Electrodo:

FICHA: HE-200
================================================================================
0: ESPECIFICACIÓN TÉCNICA
1: DE ELECTRODO
2: ELECTROMANÉTICO HE-200k
3: MENÚ DE LA INFORMACIÓN
4: Objetivo
5: Alcance de la Especificación
6: Normativa y Referencias Técnicas
7: Descripción del Sistema
8: Aplicaciones del Electrodo Electromagnético
9: Criterios de Diseño y Cálculo
10: Procedimiento de Instalación
11: Control, Verificación y Documentación
12: Conclusiones Técnicas
13: 1. OBJETO
14: La presente Especificación Técnica tiene por objeto definir las condiciones técnicas mínimas para el suministro, instalación y uso del Electrodo Electromagnético modelo HE-200k, destinado a sistemas de puesta a tierra en instalaciones eléctricas, asegurando una adecuada capacidad de conducción de corriente, baja resistencia de puesta a tierra y protección de las personas y equipos.
15: 2. ALCANCE DE LOS TRABAJOS
16: Los trabajos considerados en esta especificación comprenden:
17: Suministro del kit completo de Electrodo Electromagnético HE-200k.
18: Instalación del electrodo conforme a las instrucciones del fabricante.
19: Integración del electrodo al sistema de puesta a tierra de la instalación.
20: Uso de compuesto mejorador de suelo tipo Power GEM según especificación.
21: Consideración de criterios de diseño basados en normativa IEEE aplicable.
22: 3. NORMATIVA Y REFERENCIAS TÉCNICAS
23: El diseño y aplicación del sistema de puesta a tierra se regirá por:
24: Normas IEEE aplicables a sistemas de puesta a tierra.
25: Teoría del electrodo humeante descrita en IEEE.
26: Referencia técnica:
27: Ortiz de la Vega, Alejandro, “Capacidad de Corriente en Electrodos Tipo Delta Tubular”, 2012.
28: LAPEM México, Reporte de pruebas de resistividad, 2005.
29: 4. DESCRIPCIÓN DEL SISTEMA
30: 4.1 Electrodo Electromagnético
31: Modelo  : HE-200k
32: Tipo       : Electrodo Electromagnético de puesta a tierra
33: Material :
34: Cobre electrolítico de alta conductividad
35: Tratamiento especial anticorrosivo
36: Conexión:
37: Borne de conexión de ½ pulgada
38: Configuración:
39: Incluye dispositivo de filtración de baja frecuencia tipo LCR montado en estructura
40: Camarilla de registro normalizada.
41: 4.2 Acoplador de Impedancias
42: Modelo      : Acoplador Electro Electromagnético HE-200k
43: Capacidad : 200 A
44: Función     :
45: Punto de unión al electrodo
46: Aumento del plano de tierras de la instalación
47: Gabinete   :
48: Dimensiones aproximadas: 30 × 25 × 15 cm
49: 4.3 Compuesto Mejorador de Terreno
50: Tipo       : Power GEM
51: Cantidad:
52: 11,36 kg (3 sacos)
53: Composición:
54: Base orgánica
55: Material higroscópico coagulante de humedad
56: Función:
57: Mejora de la resistividad del suelo
58: Estabilización del rendimiento eléctrico del electrodo
59: 5. CONDICIONES DE USO
60: El Electrodo Electromagnético HE-200k está destinado a sistemas de puesta a tierra de instalaciones eléctricas donde se requiera:
61: Reducción de la resistencia de puesta a tierra
62: Adecuada disipación de corrientes de falla
63: Protección de equipos, personas y sistemas sensibles
64: 6. CRITERIOS DE CÁLCULO
65: Dado que el Electrodo Electromagnético no posee geometría convencional, no es posible aplicar directamente las ecuaciones IEEE tradicionales. Por lo tanto:
66: Se adopta una ecuación estimada basada en literatura técnica especializada.
67: Se considera un caso extremo de diseño, sin aporte de agua al terreno.
68: Resistividad asumida del terreno:
69: Ρ   = 30 Ω·m (Power GEM con humedad).
70: Factores de corrección utilizados:
71: Fv = 0,86
72: Fh = 0,5
73: Estos criterios permiten proyectar el comportamiento del electrodo de forma conservadora y segura.
74: 7. RESULTADOS ESPERADOS
75: Bajo las condiciones indicadas:
76: El electrodo HE-200k presenta un comportamiento acorde a la teoría del electrodo humeante.
77: Permite diseñar sistemas de puesta a tierra confiables conforme a IEEE.
78: La incorporación de humedad adicional en terreno disminuirá la resistividad, aumentando la capacidad de conducción de corriente.
79: 8. CONCLUSIONES TÉCNICAS
80: El Electrodo Electromagnético HE-200k constituye una solución técnicamente viable y eficiente para sistemas de puesta a tierra, incluso en condiciones desfavorables de suelo. Su diseño, junto al uso de compuesto Power GEM, permite:
81: Cumplir criterios normativos internacionales.
82: Optimizar el desempeño eléctrico del sistema de tierras.
83: Facilitar el diseño de proyectos eléctricos con alta exigencia de seguridad.

content.text:
---

# Product Data Verification Report: Electromagnetic Electrodes ELE-001 through ELE-004

**Files compared:**
- DOCX fichas at: `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\`
- JSON product files at: `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\`

**Important note about limitations:** The DOCX fichas reference "Tabla 1" / "Tabla Numero 1" for electrode data calculations and results, but these tables appear to be embedded as images (EMF/PNG format) within the Word documents, not as XML text tables. The specific numerical data from those embedded tables (resistance values, current capacity per electrode model, dimensional data) could not be extracted. The comparison below covers all text-based content that was extractable.

---

### ELE-001 (HE-45)

**Ficha file:** `ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 45  (HE).docx`
**JSON file:** `ele-001.json`

**Discrepancies:**

1. **Field: Title / Model naming**
   - Ficha: "HE - 45k" (with spaces around dash and lowercase "k" suffix)
   - JSON title: "Electrodo Electromagnético Hunter Energy HE-45" (no "k" suffix)
   - JSON specs.Modelo: "HE-45k" (has the "k")
   - **Issue:** The title omits the "k" suffix that the ficha consistently uses. The model is "HE-45k" (the "k" stands for "Kit"). The specs field is correct but the title is inconsistent.

2. **Field: specs.Capacidad**
   - Ficha: "Capacidad Max: SEGÚN TABLA NUMERO 1" (capacity is not directly stated as "45 Amperios" in the characteristics section; the 45 amperes figure appears only in the acoplador description)
   - JSON: "45 Amperios"
   - **Issue:** The ficha says capacity is "according to Table 1" in the characteristics. The 45 amperes figure comes from the acoplador description, not the electrode itself. This is technically correct but the JSON presents it as a flat capacity for the whole kit, whereas the ficha separates it as the acoplador's capacity.

3. **Field: specs.Material Electrodo**
   - Ficha: "Elaborado de cobre electrolítico altamente conductivo, tratado especialmente para retardar los efectos de la corrosión"
   - JSON: "Cobre electrolítico"
   - **Issue:** The ficha says "altamente conductivo" (highly conductive) -- the JSON uses "alta conductividad" in features but "Cobre electrolítico" alone in specs, which loses the "altamente conductivo" qualifier and the corrosion treatment description.

4. **Field: features -- "Terminal de conexion de 1/2 pulgada"**
   - Ficha HE-45: Does NOT mention any terminal/borne size. There is no mention of "1/2 pulgada" anywhere in the HE-45 ficha.
   - JSON: Lists "Terminal de conexión de 1/2 pulgada" as a feature.
   - **Issue:** This spec appears to have been borrowed from the HE-200 ficha (which explicitly mentions "Borne de conexión de 1/2 pulgada"). It is NOT in the HE-45 ficha. This is unverified data.

5. **Field: features/specs -- Gabinete dimensions**
   - Ficha: "gabinete nema 4 de 20 x 30 x 12 cm" (note the order: 20 x 30 x 12)
   - JSON feature: "Gabinete NEMA 4 de 20 x 30 x 12 cm" (matches)
   - JSON specs: "NEMA 4 — 20 x 30 x 12 cm" (matches)
   - **No issue** on the dimensions, but note that "nema" in the ficha is lowercase while JSON uses "NEMA" (uppercase). This is a minor formatting normalization, not a real error.

6. **Field: Power Gem quantity specification**
   - Ficha: "Compuesto Power Gem 11,36k. 2 Sacos de base orgánica"
   - JSON feature: "Incluye 2 sacos Power Gem (11,36 kg c/u)"
   - JSON specs: "2 sacos de 11,36 kg"
   - **Issue:** The ficha says "11,36k" (appears to be a total weight for the compound), and "2 Sacos" is the number of bags. It is ambiguous whether 11,36k means 11.36 kg total or per sack. The JSON interprets it as "11,36 kg c/u" (each), which is a reasonable interpretation but is an assumption -- the ficha text is ambiguous on this point. The HE-200 ficha (more precise) says "11,36 kg (3 sacos)" which suggests 11.36 kg is the total, not per bag.

7. **Field: description**
   - Ficha: The description spans multiple sections (introduction, characteristics, where to use, calculations, conclusions).
   - JSON: "Kit de electrodo electromagnético de cobre electrolítico de alta conductividad con tratamiento anticorrosivo. Incluye dispositivo de filtración LCR de baja frecuencia, acoplador de impedancia de 45 amperios y aditivo Power Gem para mejoramiento de suelo."
   - **No major issue** -- this is a reasonable summary. Minor note: the ficha calls it "dispositivo de filtración de baja frecuencia LCR" while the JSON says "dispositivo de filtración LCR de baja frecuencia" (word order differs slightly, but meaning is the same).

**No issues found in:**
- sku (ELE-001)
- category / categorySlug
- specs.Resistividad Diseno (rho = 30 ohm-m matches ficha)
- specs.Factor Vertical Fv = 0.86 (matches ficha)
- specs.Factor Horizontal Fh = 0.5 (matches ficha)
- specs.Unidad = "Kit completo" (ficha says "Unidad de Medida: Kit")
- inStock, badge (not verifiable from ficha)

---

### ELE-002 (HE-70)

**Ficha file:** `ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 70  (HE).docx`
**JSON file:** `ele-002.json`

**Discrepancies:**

1. **Field: Title / Model naming**
   - Ficha: "HE - 70k" (consistent "k" suffix)
   - JSON title: "Electrodo Electromagnético Hunter Energy HE-70" (no "k" suffix)
   - JSON specs.Modelo: "HE-70k" (correct)
   - **Issue:** Same as HE-45 -- title omits the "k" suffix.

2. **Field: specs.Capacidad**
   - Ficha: "Capacidad Max: SEGÚN TABLA NUMERO 1" (capacity is per table, not directly stated as 70A in characteristics)
   - The 70 amperes figure comes from the acoplador description: "con capacidad de 70 amperes"
   - JSON: "70 Amperios"
   - **Issue:** Same pattern as HE-45. Technically correct but the value is the acoplador's capacity, not a direct electrode capacity spec.

3. **Field: specs.Material Electrodo**
   - Ficha: "cobre electrolítico altamente conductivo"
   - JSON: "Cobre electrolítico"
   - **Issue:** Missing "altamente conductivo" qualifier in specs.

4. **Field: features -- "Terminal de conexion de 1/2 pulgada"**
   - Ficha HE-70: Does NOT mention any terminal/borne size anywhere.
   - JSON: Lists "Terminal de conexión de 1/2 pulgada" as a feature.
   - **Issue:** Same as HE-45 -- this spec is not in the HE-70 ficha. Unverified data.

5. **Field: specs.Gabinete -- NEMA rating**
   - Ficha: "gabinete nema 4, de 30 x 25 x 15 cm" (with NEMA 4 rating)
   - JSON specs: "NEMA 4 — 30 x 25 x 15 cm"
   - **No issue** -- matches (just case normalization).

6. **Field: features -- Gabinete dimensions**
   - Ficha: "30 x 25 x 15 cm"
   - JSON: "Gabinete NEMA 4 de 30 x 25 x 15 cm"
   - **No issue** -- matches.

7. **Field: Power Gem quantity**
   - Ficha: "Compuesto Power Gem 11,36k. 3 sacos base orgánica"
   - JSON feature: "Incluye 3 sacos Power Gem (11,36 kg c/u)"
   - JSON specs: "3 sacos de 11,36 kg"
   - **Issue:** Same ambiguity as HE-45. The ficha says "11,36k" then "3 sacos" -- unclear if 11.36 is total or per sack. The JSON assumes per sack. The HE-200 formal spec says "11,36 kg (3 sacos)" suggesting it is the total.

8. **Field: Ficha notes "Todas las medidas son aprox."**
   - Ficha: Contains the note "Todas las medidas son aprox." (All measurements are approximate) right after the acoplador dimensions.
   - JSON: Does not include this caveat anywhere.
   - **Issue:** Missing disclaimer. This is present in HE-70 but not in HE-45 or HE-100.

**No issues found in:**
- sku (ELE-002)
- category / categorySlug
- specs.Resistividad Diseno, Fv, Fh (all match)
- specs.Unidad (Kit matches)
- description (reasonable summary)
- Power Gem sack count (3 matches)
- inStock, badge

---

### ELE-003 (HE-100)

**Ficha file:** `ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 100  (HE).docx`
**JSON file:** `ele-003.json`

**Discrepancies:**

1. **Field: Title / Model naming**
   - Ficha: "HE - 100k"
   - JSON title: "Electrodo Electromagnético Hunter Energy HE-100" (no "k")
   - JSON specs.Modelo: "HE-100k" (correct)
   - **Issue:** Same pattern -- title omits "k" suffix.

2. **Field: specs.Capacidad**
   - Ficha: "Capacidad Max: SEGÚN TABLA NUMERO 1."
   - The 100 amperes figure comes from: "acoplador de impedancias Electro Magnetoactivó modelo HE-100k con capacidad de 100 amperes"
   - JSON: "100 Amperios"
   - **Issue:** Same pattern. The capacity is from the acoplador, not the electrode characteristics directly.

3. **Field: Acoplador name**
   - Ficha HE-100: "acoplador de impedancias **Electro Magnetoactivó**" (note: different name from HE-45 and HE-70 which say "Electro Electromagnético")
   - JSON description: "acoplador de impedancia de 100 amperios" (generic)
   - **Issue:** The HE-100 ficha uses a different brand/model name for the acoplador ("Electro Magnetoactivó" vs "Electro Electromagnético" in HE-45/70). This is not reflected in the JSON at all.

4. **Field: specs.Material Electrodo**
   - Ficha: "cobre electrolítico altamente conductivo"
   - JSON: "Cobre electrolítico"
   - **Issue:** Same as above -- missing "altamente conductivo".

5. **Field: features -- "Terminal de conexion de 1/2 pulgada"**
   - Ficha HE-100: Does NOT mention any terminal/borne size.
   - JSON: Lists "Terminal de conexión de 1/2 pulgada" as a feature.
   - **Issue:** Unverified data, not in this ficha.

6. **Field: specs.Gabinete -- NEMA rating MISSING**
   - Ficha HE-100: "gabinete de 300 x 250 x 150 mm" (NO NEMA rating mentioned)
   - JSON specs: "300 x 250 x 150 mm" (no NEMA rating)
   - **No issue** -- the JSON correctly omits NEMA since the HE-100 ficha doesn't mention it.
   - **However,** note that HE-45 and HE-70 fichas specify "gabinete nema 4" while HE-100 does not. The JSON correctly reflects this difference.

7. **Field: Gabinete dimensions -- unit difference from HE-45/70**
   - Ficha HE-100: "300 x 250 x 150 mm" (in millimeters)
   - JSON feature: "Gabinete de 300 x 250 x 150 mm" (matches)
   - JSON specs: "300 x 250 x 150 mm" (matches)
   - **No issue** -- units correctly reflect the ficha. But note: 300x250x150 mm = 30x25x15 cm, which is the same dimensions as HE-70 and HE-200. The ficha just uses different units.

8. **Field: Power Gem quantity**
   - Ficha: "Compuesto Power Gem 11,36 Kl, 3 sacos"
   - JSON feature: "Incluye 3 sacos Power Gem (11,36 kg c/u)"
   - JSON specs: "3 sacos de 11,36 kg"
   - **Issue:** The ficha says "11,36 Kl" (note "Kl" not "kg" -- this appears to be a typo in the ficha, likely meaning kg or kilos). Same ambiguity about whether 11.36 is total or per sack.

9. **Field: features -- "Mejora de suelo de 0,47%"**
   - Ficha: "porcentaje 0,47% de mejoramiento a la tierra" (in the calculations section)
   - JSON: "Mejora de suelo de 0,47%" (in features)
   - **Partial issue:** The ficha mentions 0.47% in the context of the Power Gem's effect on soil resistivity in the calculation methodology, not as a product feature per se. This is a technical calculation parameter being presented as a product feature. Note: HE-45 and HE-70 fichas say "porcentaje 0 de agua" (0% water) while HE-100 says "0,47% de mejoramiento a la tierra" -- these are different concepts. The JSON's presentation as a feature may be misleading.

10. **Field: Electrodo model explicit mention**
    - Ficha HE-100: "Modelo HE-100" (explicitly stated in electrode description)
    - Fichas HE-45/70: "modelo Tabla 1" (model per table, not explicitly named)
    - JSON: Specs.Modelo = "HE-100k"
    - **Note:** The HE-100 ficha is the first to explicitly name the electrode model. The "k" suffix in the JSON is not in this particular mention.

**No issues found in:**
- sku (ELE-003)
- category / categorySlug
- specs.Resistividad Diseno, Fv, Fh (all match)
- specs.Unidad (Kit matches)
- Power Gem sack count (3 matches)
- inStock, badge
- Gabinete dimensions (match)

---

### ELE-004 (HE-200)

**Ficha file:** `ESPECIFICACIÓN TÉCNICA EETT ELECTRODO HE-200.docx`
**JSON file:** `ele-004.json`

**Important context:** This ficha is a formal technical specification document (EETT), not the same format as the other three fichas. It is more structured and detailed.

**Discrepancies:**

1. **Field: Title / Model naming**
   - Ficha title page: "ELECTROMANÉTICO HE-200k" (note: typo "ELECTROMANÉTICO" instead of "ELECTROMAGNÉTICO"; "k" suffix present)
   - Ficha body: "Electrodo Electromagnético modelo HE-200k" (correct spelling)
   - JSON title: "Electrodo Electromagnético Hunter Energy HE-200" (no "k" suffix)
   - JSON specs.Modelo: "HE-200k" (correct)
   - **Issue:** Same "k" omission in title. Also, the ficha has a typo on the title page ("ELECTROMANÉTICO").

2. **Field: description -- "Camara de registro normalizada"**
   - Ficha: "Camarilla de registro normalizada" (section 4.1, under Configuración)
   - JSON feature: "Cámara de registro normalizada incluida"
   - **Issue:** The ficha says "**Camarilla** de registro" while the JSON says "**Cámara** de registro." These are different words -- "camarilla" is the term used in the ficha (possibly a trade/brand term), while "cámara" is the common Spanish word for chamber. This should match the ficha exactly.

3. **Field: specs.Capacidad**
   - Ficha: "Capacidad : 200 A" (section 4.2 Acoplador de Impedancias)
   - JSON: "200 Amperios"
   - **Minor:** The ficha uses "200 A" while the JSON says "200 Amperios." Consistent with the other products' formatting but the ficha itself uses the abbreviation.

4. **Field: Acoplador name**
   - Ficha: "Acoplador Electro Electromagnético HE-200k" (section 4.2)
   - JSON: "acoplador de 200 amperios" (in description), "Acoplador de impedancia capacidad 200A" (in features)
   - **Issue:** The JSON does not preserve the formal name "Acoplador Electro Electromagnético HE-200k" from the ficha.

5. **Field: specs.Gabinete**
   - Ficha: "Dimensiones aproximadas: 30 x 25 x 15 cm" (section 4.2)
   - JSON specs: "30 x 25 x 15 cm"
   - JSON feature: "Gabinete de 30 x 25 x 15 cm"
   - **Issue:** The ficha explicitly says "**aproximadas**" (approximate). The JSON presents dimensions as exact values without this qualifier.

6. **Field: Gabinete -- NO NEMA rating**
   - Ficha HE-200: Does NOT mention any NEMA rating for the gabinete (unlike HE-45 and HE-70 which say "nema 4").
   - JSON: Does not include NEMA (correct).
   - **No issue.**

7. **Field: Power Gem quantity interpretation**
   - Ficha: "11,36 kg (3 sacos)" (section 4.3 -- clear: 11.36 kg total, 3 bags)
   - JSON feature: "Incluye 3 sacos Power Gem (11,36 kg c/u)"
   - JSON specs: "3 sacos de 11,36 kg"
   - **SIGNIFICANT Issue:** The HE-200 ficha is the most explicit: it says "11,36 kg (3 sacos)" -- meaning 11.36 kg IS the total weight split across 3 bags (approximately 3.79 kg per bag). The JSON says "11,36 kg c/u" (each), which would mean 34.08 kg total. This is likely wrong. The 11.36 kg is the total compound weight, not per bag. This discrepancy also calls into question the same interpretation used in ELE-001, ELE-002, and ELE-003.

8. **Field: Terminal / Borne de conexion**
   - Ficha: "Borne de conexión de 1/2 pulgada" (section 4.1, explicitly stated)
   - JSON feature: "Terminal de conexión de 1/2 pulgada"
   - **Issue:** The ficha uses "**Borne**" while the JSON uses "**Terminal**." These are technically different terms (borne = binding post/terminal lug; terminal = generic terminal). Should match the ficha's terminology.

9. **Field: features -- "Cumple normas IEEE de puesta a tierra"**
   - Ficha: References IEEE extensively throughout but never states "Cumple normas IEEE." It says the electrode is "designed to be used" in an installation and results "conform to IEEE" theory, and the system allows "designing installations based on IEEE." The ficha does NOT certify IEEE compliance.
   - JSON: "Cumple normas IEEE de puesta a tierra"
   - **Issue:** The JSON states compliance ("Cumple") while the ficha only references IEEE as a design basis and theoretical framework. "Cumple" implies certification or compliance testing, which the ficha does not claim. A more accurate wording would be "Diseñado conforme a normativa IEEE" or "Basado en criterios IEEE."

10. **Field: specs.Normativa**
    - Ficha: References IEEE in sections 3, 6, 7, and 8 as the basis for design and calculations.
    - JSON: "IEEE puesta a tierra"
    - **Minor issue:** This is vague. The ficha references specific aspects: "Normas IEEE aplicables a sistemas de puesta a tierra" and "Teoría del electrodo humeante descrita en IEEE." The JSON is an abbreviation but acceptable.

11. **Field: description -- Missing key info**
    - Ficha: Explicitly includes "Especificación técnica formal para suministro, instalación y uso" as the document's purpose.
    - JSON: Includes "Especificación técnica formal para suministro, instalación y uso" (matches).
    - **No issue.**

12. **Field: Ficha mentions "Condiciones de uso" (section 5) with specific applications**
    - Ficha: "Reducción de la resistencia de puesta a tierra / Adecuada disipación de corrientes de falla / Protección de equipos, personas y sistemas sensibles"
    - JSON: Not included anywhere.
    - **Issue:** These are key use-case specifications from the ficha that are not captured in the JSON features or description.

13. **Field: Missing images array**
    - JSON: No `images` array (only single `image` field).
    - Other ELE products (001-003): Have `images` arrays.
    - **Note:** Not directly a ficha discrepancy, but an inconsistency across the product line.

**No issues found in:**
- sku (ELE-004)
- category / categorySlug
- specs.Modelo (HE-200k matches ficha body)
- specs.Resistividad Diseno (rho = 30 ohm-m matches)
- specs.Fv = 0.86, Fh = 0.5 (match ficha section 6)
- Power Gem composition: "Base orgánica, material higroscópico coagulante de humedad" (matches JSON description of "aditivo Power Gem para mejoramiento de suelo")
- inStock, badge

---

## Cross-Product Summary of Systematic Issues

| Issue | ELE-001 | ELE-002 | ELE-003 | ELE-004 |
|-------|---------|---------|---------|---------|
| Title missing "k" suffix | YES | YES | YES | YES |
| "Terminal 1/2 pulgada" not in ficha | YES | YES | YES | N/A (in ficha but called "Borne") |
| Power Gem "11,36 kg c/u" likely wrong (probably total) | LIKELY | LIKELY | LIKELY | CONFIRMED WRONG |
| Material specs missing "altamente conductivo" | YES | YES | YES | N/A (different wording) |
| Capacity from acoplador, not electrode spec | YES | YES | YES | YES |

### Critical Issue: Power Gem Weight

The most significant discrepancy across all four products is the Power Gem weight interpretation. The HE-200 ficha is unambiguous: "11,36 kg (3 sacos)" = 11.36 kg total in 3 bags. All four JSON files interpret this as "11,36 kg c/u" (each), which would mean:
- HE-45: 2 x 11.36 = 22.72 kg (JSON) vs likely 11.36 kg total (ficha)
- HE-70: 3 x 11.36 = 34.08 kg (JSON) vs likely 11.36 kg total (ficha)
- HE-100: 3 x 11.36 = 34.08 kg (JSON) vs likely 11.36 kg total (ficha)
- HE-200: 3 x 11.36 = 34.08 kg (JSON) vs 11.36 kg total (ficha -- confirmed)

This is a factual error that directly affects customer expectations regarding product weight and should be corrected.

### Note on Embedded Tables

All four fichas reference data tables ("Tabla 1", "Tabla Numero 1") containing electrode dimensions, resistance values, and current capacity calculations. These tables are embedded as images (EMF/PNG) in the DOCX files and their data could not be programmatically extracted for this comparison. A manual review of these tables against the JSON specs would be needed for complete verification.

# DISCREPANCY REPORT -- Electromagnetic Electrodes ELE-001 through ELE-004

## Method

Each DOCX ficha tecnica was parsed (text extracted from `word/document.xml` via adm-zip). Every extractable field was compared against the corresponding product JSON. Severity uses three levels:

- **CRITICAL** -- Factually wrong data that would mislead a customer or cause a commercial problem.
- **MEDIUM** -- Missing information, imprecise wording, or terminology that does not match the ficha.
- **LOW** -- Formatting, capitalization, word-order, or abbreviation differences that do not change meaning.

**Important caveat:** All four fichas reference a "Tabla 1" / "Tabla Numero 1" containing electrode dimensional data, resistance values, and current-capacity calculations. These tables are embedded as images (EMF/PNG) inside the DOCX files and their numerical content could not be programmatically extracted. Any values that exist only inside those image-tables are therefore not covered below.

---

## ELE-001 (HE-45)

**Ficha:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 45  (HE).docx`
**JSON:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-001.json`

| # | Field | Ficha value | JSON value | Severity |
|---|-------|-------------|------------|----------|
| 1 | `title` | "HE - 45k" (the "k" = Kit appears on every page) | `"Electrodo Electromagnético Hunter Energy HE-45"` -- missing "k" | MEDIUM |
| 2 | `features[4]` / `specs.Power Gem Incluido` | "Compuesto Power Gem 11,36k. 2 Sacos" -- 11,36 kg is the **total** compound weight in 2 bags | `"Incluye 2 sacos Power Gem (11,36 kg c/u)"` / `"2 sacos de 11,36 kg"` -- reads as 11,36 kg **per bag** (22,72 kg total) | CRITICAL |
| 3 | `features[5]` | No mention of any terminal/borne size anywhere in this ficha | `"Terminal de conexión de 1/2 pulgada"` -- fabricated or borrowed from HE-200 ficha | CRITICAL |
| 4 | `specs.Material Electrodo` | "cobre electrolítico **altamente conductivo**" | `"Cobre electrolítico"` -- missing qualifier | MEDIUM |
| 5 | `description` | "dispositivo de filtración **de baja frecuencia LCR**" (LCR at the end) | `"dispositivo de filtración LCR de baja frecuencia"` (LCR in the middle) | LOW |
| 6 | `features[0]` | "altamente conductivo" | `"alta conductividad"` -- paraphrase, not exact ficha wording | LOW |
| 7 | `specs.Gabinete` | "gabinete **nema** 4" (lowercase) | `"NEMA 4"` (uppercase) | LOW |

**Fields verified as correct:** `sku`, `category`, `categorySlug`, `specs.Modelo` ("HE-45k"), `specs.Capacidad` (45A matches acoplador text), `specs.Gabinete` dimensions (20 x 30 x 12 cm), `specs.Resistividad Diseno` (30 ohm-m), `specs.Fv` (0,86), `specs.Fh` (0,5), `specs.Unidad` (Kit), Power Gem sack count (2), `features[1]` (LCR filter), `features[6]` (anticorrosivo treatment mentioned in ficha), `inStock`/`badge` (not verifiable from ficha).

---

## ELE-002 (HE-70)

**Ficha:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 70  (HE).docx`
**JSON:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-002.json`

| # | Field | Ficha value | JSON value | Severity |
|---|-------|-------------|------------|----------|
| 1 | `title` | "HE - 70k" | `"...HE-70"` -- missing "k" | MEDIUM |
| 2 | `features[4]` / `specs.Power Gem Incluido` | "Compuesto Power Gem 11,36k. 3 sacos" -- 11,36 kg **total** in 3 bags | `"Incluye 3 sacos Power Gem (11,36 kg c/u)"` / `"3 sacos de 11,36 kg"` -- reads as 11,36 kg **per bag** (34,08 kg total) | CRITICAL |
| 3 | `features[5]` | No mention of any terminal/borne size in this ficha | `"Terminal de conexión de 1/2 pulgada"` -- not in ficha | CRITICAL |
| 4 | `specs.Material Electrodo` | "cobre electrolítico **altamente conductivo**" | `"Cobre electrolítico"` | MEDIUM |
| 5 | (missing from JSON) | Ficha states: "Todas las medidas son aprox." after acoplador dimensions | Not captured anywhere in JSON | MEDIUM |
| 6 | `description` | "dispositivo de filtración de baja frecuencia LCR" | `"dispositivo de filtración LCR de baja frecuencia"` | LOW |
| 7 | `features[0]` | "altamente conductivo" | `"alta conductividad"` | LOW |
| 8 | `specs.Gabinete` | "gabinete nema 4" (lowercase) | `"NEMA 4"` (uppercase) | LOW |

**Fields verified as correct:** `sku`, `category`, `categorySlug`, `specs.Modelo` ("HE-70k"), `specs.Capacidad` (70A matches acoplador text), `specs.Gabinete` dimensions (30 x 25 x 15 cm), `specs.Resistividad Diseno`, `specs.Fv`, `specs.Fh`, `specs.Unidad`, sack count (3), `features[1]`, `features[6]`.

---

## ELE-003 (HE-100)

**Ficha:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\Productos\ELECTRDOS ELECTROMAGNETICOS HUNTER ENERGY HE\ELECTRODO ELECTROMAGNETICO HE 100  (HE).docx`
**JSON:** `c:\Users\V\Documents\GitHub\Pagiweb2\src\content\products\ele-003.json`

| # | Field | Ficha value | JSON value | Severity |
